Text:
function ERI_EP04_07()
    --.起-5【11月第2週】「デートするのか、私以外の女と」
    SaveData.Title = "デートするのか、私以外の女と"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[ That night. When I confided in Akira about what happened at the academy, she responded with a very flustered reaction. ]])

    --//BU：アキラ（真剣・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0580.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious・Loungewear
 “S-So you actually agreed, Minachin? To a date with Hermes Himegami?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0652.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual
 “Yeah. It seemed Uran and Lira already had plans this weekend, so they just helped with the alibi, and I ended up being the one to go on the date.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0653.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smiling・Casual
 “It’s a huge chance to learn about Marika-nee, after all. I have to do my best.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0581.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious・Loungewear
 “...Are you sure you don’t have any ulterior motives? The other party is a current top idol, you know?” ]])

    MSG([[ Akira, unusually suspicious, narrowed her eyes as she asked. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0582.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Grinning・Loungewear
 “Even a zen-like guy like Minachin must get excited, right?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0654.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile・Casual
 “Well, that might be true.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0583.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Flustered・Loungewear
 “Ugh... I-I see.” ]])

    MSG([[ Huh? Somehow, Akira seemed to have gotten downhearted...? ]])

    MSG([[ Did I say something strange? Maybe she was worried I’d be swayed by Hermes-san. ]])

    MSG([[ To put her at ease, I gently said. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0655.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smiling・Casual
 “Don’t worry. It’s true I’m nervous spending a whole day with Hermes-san, but to me, Marika-nee and Akira are far, far more important than any idol.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0656.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smiling・Casual
 “I promise I’ll properly get all the information I can.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0584.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sad・Loungewear
 “M-Minachin...” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0585.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sad・Loungewear
 “I’m sorry. It’s just natural to feel a bit uneasy given who the other person is.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0586.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear
 “The big sis-com demon king Minachin isn’t going to be easily charmed, right?<sprite="Emoji" name="note">” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0657.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile・Casual
 “Big sis-com demon king, huh.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It was harsh, but I was glad Akira was smiling. ]])

    MSG([[ Since the school festival, Akira sometimes wore a sad expression. But when I asked why, she said “It’s nothing” and quickly showed her usual cute smile, so I didn’t press further. ]])

    MSG([[ So at least when we’re home together, I’ll do lots of things that make Akira happy. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0658.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smiling・Casual
 “Since we can’t hang out this weekend, I’ll try making the dish I’m sure will make Akira happy today. Taste the demon king’s home cooking.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0587.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised・Loungewear
 “Hmm? A new recipe?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1021.wav") --ネームが「エリカ」となっていたため、ボイスがエリカになっている
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual
 “No, it’s a bit different. It’s a deluxe version of the usual rice bowl, I guess<sprite="Emoji" name="note">” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0588.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised・Loungewear
 “The usual rice bowl... Could it be, Minachin-don?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I took out kuruma shrimp, dried shrimp, eggs, mitsuba, and white leek from the fridge. ]])

    MSG([[ Shelled the kuruma shrimp, removed heads, and tossed them into the pot. ]])

    MSG([[ Removed the vein from the shrimp bodies, rinsed them lightly in salt water, lined them up one by one on kitchen paper, then covered with more kitchen paper to drain moisture. ]])

    MSG([[ Meanwhile, I put two pots on the stove at once: one filled with shrimp heads and the other with pre-prepared broth for oyakodon. ]])

    MSG([[ Added white leek to the broth and lightly boiled it, then added the drained shrimp bodies. ]])

    MSG([[ Next to it, the shrimp head broth had brewed nicely, so I turned off the heat and added miso. ]])

    MSG([[ Without rest, the shrimp in the oyakodon pot turned a nice color, so I added a small amount of dried shrimp, then gently poured in the beaten eggs. ]])

    MSG([[ Poured the fragrant shrimp miso soup into a bowl, then placed the shrimp-egg topping over the rice bowl. ]])

    MSG([[ Added chopped leek as garnish to the miso soup, and sprinkled shredded nori and mitsuba over the bowl, completing tonight’s dinner―― ]])

    MSG([[ Shrimp broth miso soup and shrimp tamago don. Shrimp tamago don uses lots of Akira’s favorite shrimp, and she calls it “Minachin-don.” It’s my proud masterpiece. ]])

    MSG([[ Usually I use small shrimp for this bowl, but today I used special offer kuruma shrimp. It’s already delicious as is, but today’s taste will surely be exceptional. ]])

    --//BU：アキラ（笑顔・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0589.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear
 “Slurp” ]])

    MSG([[ Drawn by the smell of her favorite shrimp, Akira unusually stopped playing games early and sat at the table. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing that lovely smile made me truly glad I went all out for dinner. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0659.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smiling・Casual
 “Here’s your tea. I’ll make my own don bowl now, so eat yours before it gets cold.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0590.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear
 “It feels bad to eat first, but I’d feel even worse leaving these delicious shrimps uneaten, so thank you!” ]])

    MSG([[ Akira quickly said thanks, picked up her chopsticks, and took a big bite of the bowl. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0591.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised・Loungewear
 “Wow... D-Delicious. The shrimp is so plump.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0592.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised・Loungewear
 “The rich shrimp flavor is balanced perfectly by the gentle sweetness of the egg, creating an exquisite taste.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0593.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear
 “And the crunchy dried shrimp texture is the perfect accent. The soft half-boiled egg, plump shrimp, and crunchy dried shrimp form a wonderful trio!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0594.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious・Loungewear
 “This is definitely the greatest masterpiece among Minachin’s cooking. I say that as a hardcore picky eater, so no mistake.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0660.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile・Sweat・Casual
 “I think calling yourself a picky eater lowers the credibility of that review.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I’m beyond happy she’s this pleased. Seeing Akira now, she hasn’t changed from the bright girl she was before. ]])

    MSG([[ Believing that if I continue caring for Akira like this, whatever troubles she might be carrying will fade away. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0595.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear
 “I-I’ve already finished... My stomach is so happy. My head is a shrimp paradise. I want to fall asleep like this forever.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0596.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear
 “Thank you for the meal, Minachin. Being able to eat such delicious food makes me fully realize how lucky I am.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0661.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile・Casual
 “You’re welcome. Since it’s bad to get sleepy right after eating, I’ll make some coffee for after. Sit down and wait a bit.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    --//BU：UIからミナトが消失（アキラを一人残す形に）

STOP_BGM(2000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0597.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear
 “Thank you, Minachin.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0598.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear
 “Really, I am a lucky girl.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0599.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sad・Loungewear
 “Too lucky... maybe more than I deserve.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_08")
end
